summary: Implements the main transformer layer of the LayoutLMv3 model in TensorFlow, combining text tokens and visual patches, handling embedding lookup, visual bounding‑box initialization, attention‑mask preparation, and optional head pruning to produce multimodal contextual representations.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate a pretrained multimodal document understanding model into TensorFlow pipelines for tasks like form extraction, receipt analysis, and document classification.
